input.description: String Value - The name of a configuration item defined in a configuration module. Valid Values: BMC_AR_System, Service Desk, CiscoWorks LMS, Atrium CMDB.

class type mappings

String Value - Indicates whether or not the process completed successfully.
Valid values: success, failure
String Value - A process specific string that explains the value of success status.
An xml containing mappings for isVirtual

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string('${version}') = "v8.0""> <xsl:copy-of select="//$[configuration name]/BMC_AR_System_v8_0/*[local-name()='ComputerSystem_Mappings']/*" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:copy-of select="//$[configuration name]/*[local-name()='ComputerSystem_Mappings']/*" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: This workflow will extract all configuration data by configuration name for this module.
